creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Half of a skirt, Imperial yellow satin, composed of three broad panels, each outlined in black satin applied in flat bands. In lower parts of panels are woven clouds, temples, trees, etc., in rose, two shades of blue, green, white and metallic threads. Skirt bordered with flat band of black, frayed at bottom and lined with rose silk. Wide cotton waistband incomplete.
title: Half of a skirt
